# a "view" module generated by Pyrustic Project Manager
import tkinter as tk

from pyrustic.widget.toast import Toast

    def __init__(self):
        super().__init__()
        self._body = None

    def _on_build(self):
        self._body = tk.Frame()

        pass

    def _on_destroy(self):
